fields.name: Strength
fields.description: How strong you are

fields.name: Dexterity
fields.description: Your ability to control your movements

fields.name: Constitution
fields.description: The physical condition of your body

fields.name: Intelligence
fields.description: The amount of raw knowledge you can keep on hand at once

fields.name: Wisdom
fields.description: Your ability to understand the workings of things

fields.name: Charisma
fields.description: The strength of your personality

fields.name: Strength Modifier
fields.description: Amount added to ${Strength}$ based ${Skill Checks}$

fields.name: Dexterity Modifier
fields.description: Amount added to ${Dexterity}$ based ${Skill Checks}$

fields.name: Constitution Modifier
fields.description: Amount added to ${Constitution}$ based ${Skill Checks}$

fields.name: Intelligence Modifier
fields.description: Amount added to ${Intelligence}$ based ${Skill Checks}$

fields.name: Wisdom Modifier
fields.description: Amount added to ${Wisdom}$ based ${Skill Checks}$

fields.name: Charisma Modifier
fields.description: Amount added to ${Charisma}$ based ${Skill Checks}$

fields.name: Mobility
fields.description: How mobile you are, usually restricted by armor. This determines the max contribution of dexterity to your armor

fields.name: Playing As
fields.description: Indicates the primary character for a player

fields.name: Played By
fields.description: Indicates the primary player for an entity

fields.name: Limited
fields.description: Limit the number of chaining branches to take

fields.name: End Time
fields.description: When this finished

fields.name: Loyal To
fields.description: Indicates who this entity is loyal to, used for summons and minions and the like

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Used for things like page and document titles. This differs from the Title class which is more for things like 'King', 'Doctor', or 'Savior of Callenth'

fields.name: Titles
fields.description: Titles held by this object for designation purposes

fields.name: Skill
fields.description: The skill involved in using or operation this object, if any.

fields.name: Alignment
fields.description: The alignment of this entity.

fields.name: Population
fields.description: The theoretical number of creatures inside this object. This is NOT meant to reflect entities.length but rather total general population of something like a city where entites.length would represent the number of special creatures present and may or maynot be part of the population count.

fields.name: Pool Gain
fields.description: Adds to the character pool for selecting changes

fields.name: Spacing
fields.description: Used to indicate what kind of spacing should be used between objects, for instance in datasets, the starting dataset may specify how to separate generated names and subsequent dataset spacings are ignored

fields.name: Skill Checks
fields.description: Maps a Skill ID to this objects numerical ability to perform that skill.

fields.name: Incidents
fields.description: IDs of the Incidents to which this object is associated

fields.name: Selection
fields.description: An array of objects that define choices for a player to make. This is largely for interpretation by the UI, should attempt to leverage/align the 'point_pool' object, and is merely maintained by the server. Usage is meant for things like choosing class specialization feats such as Rangers choosing between Archery, Dueling, etc.

fields.name: History
fields.description: A quick reference array of recent actions taken. This is meant to aid players with reviewing recent activity and not meant to serve as the entirety of their history as that is handled by the universe chronicle

fields.name: Entities
fields.description: List of entities tied to this object

fields.name: Points of Interest
fields.description: List of locations that may be of interest. This field's data is usually inferred during render rather than being explicitly defined and is thus not currently attached to any class.

fields.name: Map Distance
fields.description: Constant for distance measuring across a location.

fields.name: Killed
fields.description: List of creatures killed in a skirmish

fields.name: Retreated
fields.description: List of creatures that escaped during combat

fields.name: Events
fields.description: List of events, primarily rolls, for this fight. When active, chat events are also saved here.

fields.name: Contains
fields.description: List of entities and items inside this object

fields.name: Gender
fields.description: The gender of this object

fields.name: URL
fields.description: Indicates the web location for associated information on this object

fields.name: NPC Task
fields.description: The general task or job for this NPC

fields.name: NPC Voice
fields.description: The general tone of voice for this NPC

fields.name: NPC Personality
fields.description: The general personality of this NPC

fields.name: Is Chest
fields.description: Flag to indicate an entity is treasure chest of some kind that allows easy player viewing/looting

fields.name: Is Locked
fields.description: Indicates that this is closed in some fashion, such as a locked up shop or locked chest.

fields.name: Is NPC
fields.description: Flag to indicate an entity is an NPC

fields.name: Is Shop
fields.description: Flag to indicate an entity has shop functionality

fields.name: Is Primary
fields.description: Marks an object as primary for display considerations

fields.name: Is Hostile
fields.description: Flag to indicate an entity is explicitly hostile, generally for monster-esq creatures

fields.name: Profile
fields.description: Profile data to use for this object

fields.name: Portrait
fields.description: Portrait (Short Hand or Bust) image for this object

fields.name: Picture
fields.description: Picutre (Full Length or Encompassing) image for this object

fields.name: Background Image
fields.description: Background image for this object. This is for objects like locations to display as backgrounds when entities are at the location.

fields.name: Main Weapon
fields.description: Indicates which of the weapons held by this creature is its primary weapon.

fields.name: Coordinates
fields.description: Array of coordinates to render on an image for thigns such as a map.

fields.name: Has Rendering Path
fields.description: Flag to indicate this object has a rendering path.

fields.name: Has Rendering Filled
fields.description: Flag to indicate this object's rendered path should be filled in.

fields.name: Rendering Path
fields.description: Point path for the polygon. This array contains 2 element arrays for the x & y coordinates. May also contain a reference to an Entity or Location and subsequently leverages the x,y coordinates of that object. The Entity/Location note is not restrictive, resolved object just requires an x and y numeric property. Unresolvable values are skipped with a console warning.

fields.name: Rendering Closed Path
fields.description: When true, this path is treated as a polygon with fill

fields.name: Rendering Fill Color
fields.description: Coloring. Use Hex RGBA specification; ie. #FFFFFF60

fields.name: Rendering Path Color
fields.description: Coloring. Use Hex RGBA specification; ie. #FFFFFF60

fields.name: Point Pool
fields.description: Various points for improving your character in various ways

fields.name: Acquired In
fields.description: Session when this was acquired

fields.name: From
fields.description: This was learned from this creature

fields.name: Rendering Path Thickness
fields.description: Coloring

fields.name: Map Image
fields.description: Map image for this object

fields.name: Map Background Image
fields.description: Background image for the associated map. Something like a star field. fixed and covers the rest of the canvas.

fields.name: URLs
fields.description: Array of URLs

fields.name: Cost
fields.description: The general cost of this object

fields.name: Initiative
fields.description: Combat order for this creature

fields.name: Passive Perception
fields.description: This creature's ability to notice things without specifically looking for them

fields.name: Current Stealth
fields.description: Current stealth for this creature

fields.name: Current Perception
fields.description: Current perception for this creature

fields.name: Investigation
fields.description: Current investigative ability for this creature

fields.name: Skirmishes
fields.description: List of fights that occurred in during this meeting

fields.name: Known By
fields.description: List of entities that know this

fields.name: Held By
fields.description: The entity holding this object

fields.name: Versioning
fields.description: Background field used for large text entries to track changes

fields.name: Versions
fields.description: Stores previous versions of text

fields.name: Audios
fields.description: List of audio IDs

fields.name: Audio
fields.description: Audio ID for this object

fields.name: Durability
fields.description: The durability of this object

fields.name: Journal
fields.description: The Journal objects associated with this object, typically for use with Pages

fields.name: Journals
fields.description: The Journal objects associated with this object, typically for use with Pages

fields.name: Prepared
fields.description: List of spells that were explicitly prepared

fields.name: Memorized
fields.description: List of spells that were explicitly memorized

fields.name: HP
fields.description: Current health points for this object

fields.name: Temp HP
fields.description: Current temporary health points for this object. Similar to a shield

fields.name: Max HP
fields.description: Max health points for this object

fields.name: Obscured
fields.description: Flag to hide this from display to players

fields.name: Spell Slots
fields.description: Maps a spell level to the number of spell slots left for that object

fields.name: Max Spell Slots
fields.description: Maps a spell level to the maximium number of spell slots for that object

fields.name: Warlock Spell Slots
fields.description: Special spell slots for warlocks. Notably these are regained on short and long rests.

fields.name: Max Warlock Slots
fields.description: Maximum number of warlock spell slots

fields.name: Warlock Spell Level
fields.description: The level at which a warlock spell slot casts spells

fields.name: Equipment Slots
fields.description: Maps a Slot ID to the count of slots this object has to put equipment to

fields.name: Damage Type
fields.description: The damage type this object is considered to deal.

fields.name: Use Atribute
fields.description: The attribute (typically primary stat) used when using this object.

fields.name: Dice Type
fields.description: The type of dice primarily associated with this object.

fields.name: Hit Dice
fields.description: Hit dice present for this object, mapping the dice type (ie. d8) to the count possessed

fields.name: Hit Dice Maximum
fields.description: Hit dice present for this object, mapping the dice type (ie. d8) to the count offered

fields.name: Minimum Range
fields.description: This action is unable to target things this close or closer to you

fields.name: Range
fields.description: The reach of this action

fields.name: Maximum Range
fields.description: Targeting objects between your range and maximum range causes you to roll with disadvantage

fields.name: Maximum Spells Prepared
fields.description: Maximum number of spells you may have prepared

fields.name: Maximum Cantrips Prepared
fields.description: Maximum number of cantrips you may have prepared

fields.name: Spell DC
fields.description: The general difficulty of avoiding the full power of you cantrips and spells

fields.name: Spell Attack
fields.description: Your ability to aim a spell when performing it as an attack

fields.name: Rolled HP
fields.description: The total amount of HP rolled for an entity while leveling

fields.name: Damage
fields.description: Maps a Damage Type ID to a formula for the amount done by this object

fields.name: Debuff
fields.description: Indicating this is a negative effect

fields.name: Ritual
fields.description: Indicates this can be performed as a ritual as well as cast

fields.name: Known Knowledge
fields.description: Array of knowledge known by this object

fields.name: Casting Time
fields.description: Time to cast this spell in rounds

fields.name: Is Cast Attack
fields.description: Indicates this spell is an attack and is against creature Armor instead of a save for taking effect.

fields.name: Casting Type
fields.description: Usually Spell Cast or Spell Attack

fields.name: Whose Turn
fields.description: Indicates the entity whose turn it is in combat

fields.name: Save With
fields.description: Names the attribute with which to save against this object

fields.name: Cast With
fields.description: Overrides the default casting attribute of the casting creature for this spell

fields.name: Verbal Components
fields.description: Spell has verbal components

fields.name: Gesture Components
fields.description: Spell has hand gestures as part of its casting

fields.name: Material Components
fields.description: Array of items needed to cast this spell (Use parental IDs)

fields.name: Source
fields.description: The creature that told, taught, or gave you this

fields.name: Cause
fields.description: The spell that caused this. Typically an effect but possibly the creator of an object as well.

fields.name: Instilled
fields.description: List of effects to instill on a target as part of taking damage. Leverages the `unique` and `damage_required` fields on effects to determine when/how to add them.

fields.name: Damage Required
fields.description: Used for instilling effects on entities from taking damage. Flags that damage must be dealt for the effect to be added

fields.name: Hit Required
fields.description: Used for instilling effects on entities from taking successful attacks or failed saves against spells. Notably a spell with effects that have neither damage_required nor hit_required checked will always apply. This condition applying that the Hit roll exceeds AC or that the save is failed.

fields.name: Is Display
fields.description: Flags an object as used for display purposes only in cases where objects that `fire` are grouped with non-fired elements

fields.name: Unique
fields.description: Flag to indicate that this should only exist once in some context; ie. A unique effect should only exist for an entity once by parental ID

fields.name: Is Owned
fields.description: Quick flag to note that this object is owned by a specific player

fields.name: Is Default
fields.description: When true, this object is a copy and should be filtered out of some displays

fields.name: Is Copy
fields.description: When true, this object is a copy and should be filtered out of some displays

fields.name: Is Template
fields.description: When true, this object is meant to be a source for information and not given directly

fields.name: Template Process
fields.description: Specifies the process for for copying this object

fields.name: Duration
fields.description: How long something lasts once created; Such as effects or items. Spells may list this for how long a subsequent effect lasts.

fields.name: Potency
fields.description: How strong this object is. This is for use as part of computed values

fields.name: Receive
fields.description: Each entry in the array indicates an ID to copy and where to put the copy as part of receiving this. This is processed server side instead of inherited to generate copies as needed. If no copy is needed, inheritance should be used instead.

fields.name: Importance
fields.description: How important is this?

fields.name: Acquired
fields.description: When you acquired this

fields.name: Effect Height
fields.description: The height of the effect

fields.name: Effect Radius
fields.description: The radius of the effect

fields.name: Effect Shape
fields.description: The shape of the effect

fields.name: Performable Actions
fields.description: List of actions this entity can perform

fields.name: Actions
fields.description: The current action count for this object by type; main, bonus, reaction

fields.name: Nation
fields.description: The nation responsible for this

fields.name: Action Cost
fields.description: Indicates the action cost of this object by mapping the action types to their numeric costs; ie. action_cost.bonus = 1. Multiple costs are addative, so bonus = 1 & main = 1 means thsi object costs a main and bonus action

fields.name: Action Max
fields.description: Action count max for the various types.

fields.name: Section
fields.description: A grouping value for the object

fields.name: Targets
fields.description: Types that this object can target, for instance types of objects or creatures that a spell can affect

fields.name: Resistance
fields.description: Maps a Damage Type ID to a formula for the amount that this object reduces that damage type by when suffered by this object

fields.name: Dashboard
fields.description: The dashboard used by this object that indicates the widget layout to use

fields.name: Component
fields.description: Names the component to use for rendering

fields.name: Default
fields.description: Indicates that htis is the default object to use in certain cases such as dashboards

fields.name: Selectable
fields.description: Indicates that this object is selectable for some reason, such as a Feat or Proficiency that can be selected while leveling

fields.name: Refresh
fields.description: When true, the system will automatically refresh this object

fields.name: Is Background
fields.description: Flag for feats to be marked as potential charact backgrounds

fields.name: Datasets
fields.description: Tracks dataset associated with this object

fields.name: Playable
fields.description: Indicates that players can select this object as part of object construction

fields.name: Content Type
fields.description: Used for file data to indicate the type of data it holds

fields.name: Nickname
fields.description: Short name for this

fields.name: Back Story
fields.description: Backstory for this existance

fields.name: Caster
fields.description: The entity that knows this spell. Used for spell value calculations.

fields.name: Armor
fields.description: Your current Armor Class (AC)

fields.name: Gold
fields.description: The amount of gold on or in this entity or object

fields.name: Max Gold
fields.description: The maximum amount of gold this object or entity can hold

fields.name: Height
fields.description: Height

fields.name: Worshipped God
fields.description: Worshipped God

fields.name: Born
fields.description: The time at which this was born

fields.name: Age
fields.description: This creature's age

fields.name: Move Speed
fields.description: Movement speed while on the ground

fields.name: Swim Speed
fields.description: Movement speed while on the water or other liquids

fields.name: Fly Speed
fields.description: Movement speed while in the air

fields.name: Needs
fields.description: Maps an object ID to a needed count. For instance, Slot IDs are used to map the ID to the number of that slot used by this object. Archetypes use this to mark prior needed archetypes before this one can be choosen.

fields.name: Remaining Slots
fields.description: The calculated list of slots that are unused. This is used primarily for conditionals

fields.name: Conditions
fields.description: Lists the condition effects active on the entity, such as ${Blinded}$ or ${Deafened}$.

fields.name: Last Rest
fields.description: The last time you took a long rest. Used for checking exhaustion and if another long rest can be done.

fields.name: Classes
fields.description: List of classes currently applied to this entity

fields.name: Populace
fields.description: List of entities that are considered active at the location

fields.name: Capital
fields.description: The location of the capital for a nation

fields.name: Also
fields.description: Additional actions to fire with this one. Example, 'action:rest:finish' is an also for 'action:rest:trace' and 'action:rest:long' for common full rest triggers while allowing those 2 types of rest to be seperate.

fields.name: Race
fields.description: Race of this entity

fields.name: Effects
fields.description: Effects present on this object

fields.name: Weather
fields.description: Weather at a location

fields.name: Weather Tabulation
fields.description: Used by locations to determine the next weather state. This in its simpliest form comes down to something like '3d6' which then uses the weather 'mode range' to determine the weather.

fields.name: Weather Duration
fields.description: When a weather condition takes effect at a location, the duration is calculated using this string with 'weather' and 'location' being base properties for performing the calculation. This time then sets an occurrence in the Chronicler to end the current weather state and start a new one.

fields.name: Weather Min Mode
fields.description: Mode is essentially the range in which this weather state should be used and may vary by locational attributes. The basis of the range is to allow dice rolls to pick the weather and the mode range dicates which weather comes up.

fields.name: Weather Max Mode
fields.description: Mode is essentially the range in which this weather state should be used and may vary by locational attributes. The basis of the range is to allow dice rolls to pick the weather and the mode range dicates which weather comes up.

fields.name: Speed X
fields.description: Spedd traveling on the x axis

fields.name: Speed Y
fields.description: Spedd traveling on the y axis

fields.name: Variants
fields.description: Variations of this race

fields.name: Is Singular
fields.description: When true, this object will not be copied when given.

fields.name: Is Sharing
fields.description: When true, this creature is sharing its inventory.

fields.name: Death Saves
fields.description: Numer of successful death saves

fields.name: Death Fails
fields.description: Numer of failed death saves

fields.name: Feats
fields.description: Feats improving or diminishing this object

fields.name: Notes
fields.description: General text for notes taken by this object.

fields.name: Equipped
fields.description: List of objects currently equipped to this one.

fields.name: User
fields.description: The object using this object

fields.name: Party
fields.description: The party that this object is in

fields.name: Cell Width
fields.description: Number of cells (out of 4) that the widget should occupy in width

fields.name: Charges
fields.description: Number of expendable charges available on this object.

fields.name: Max Charges
fields.description: Maximum number of expendable charges available on this object.

fields.name: Recharges At
fields.description: [Deprecated] Maps an event to the number of times that event must occur for this object to gain a charge.

fields.name: Short Rests
fields.description: Number of short rests towards a charge.

fields.name: Long Rests
fields.description: Number of long rests towards a charge.

fields.name: Short Rests Needed
fields.description: Number of short rests needed to gain a charge.

fields.name: Long Rests Needed
fields.description: Number of long rests needed to gain a charge.

fields.name: Recharges After
fields.description: Amount of raw time for a charge to be gained

fields.name: Recharging Count
fields.description: Maps an event to the number of times that event has occurred for this object toward recharging.

fields.name: Recharges On
fields.description: Lists the events that this object uses to recharge. This is potentially different from the object's Recharges At keys for conditional flavoring.

fields.name: No Charges Transform
fields.description: When set, this object takes the specified object as a parent in place of its current one when it runs out of charges.

fields.name: Proficiency
fields.description: The base added skill when an object is proficient with some aspect.

fields.name: Level
fields.description: The general level of this object.

fields.name: Class Levels
fields.description: Maps a Class ID to this object's level in that class.

fields.name: Class Level History
fields.description: Stores the order in which this object leveled up classes

fields.name: Proficiency
fields.description: Needed Proficiency for using this object with proficiency.

fields.name: Skill Proficiency
fields.description: Maps skill IDs to a boolean to indicate proficiency in that skill.

fields.name: Advantage
fields.description: Counts the amount of advantage this object has towards a skill check. Negative advantage here represents disadvantage on the check

fields.name: Disadvantage
fields.description: Counts the amount of disadvantage this object has towards a skill check.

fields.name: Accepted Types
fields.description: Lists types that are accepted by this object.

fields.name: Rejected Types
fields.description: Lists types that are rejected by this object.

fields.name: Category
fields.description: Category for this object. This is essentially just a flat qualifier and taken literally.

fields.name: State
fields.description: General state indicator for the object.

fields.name: Master Screen
fields.description: When true, this object is flagged for display on a Game Master's screen.

fields.name: Master Review
fields.description: When true, this object needs reviewed by a game master.

fields.name: Game
fields.description: Indicates a minigame supported by the instance to which this object refers.

fields.name: Proficiencies
fields.description: Proficiencies held by this object.

fields.name: Consume
fields.description: Can be consumed in the indicated quantity.

fields.name: Consumes To
fields.description: What this object becomes after consuming.

fields.name: Consume Hint
fields.description: Displayed to describe the consumption.

fields.name: Consume Icon
fields.description: Icon to display for consuming this object.

fields.name: Symbol
fields.description: The symbol for this god, city, or group.

fields.name: Uses From
fields.description: This uses charges from another property.

fields.name: DC
fields.description: The Difficulty Check associated with this object. The default for this when a creature is using it is generally that creature's {{Spell DC}}

fields.name: Spell Cast DC
fields.description: The Difficulty Check associated with spell attacks cast by this object.

fields.name: Spell Attack DC
fields.description: The Difficulty Check associated with spells cast by this object.

fields.name: Weight Locked
fields.description: When true, objects considered to be inside this object should not add weight to this object.

fields.name: Attunements
fields.description: List of objects to whith this object is attuned.

fields.name: Attunes
fields.description: Indicates if this object can attune to another object.

fields.name: Attunement Locked
fields.description: Indicates if this object can not unattune voluntarily.

fields.name: Attunement BLocked
fields.description: Indicates that attunements to this object or from this entity can not be started voluntarily.

fields.name: Attuned
fields.description: The object attuned to this object.

fields.name: Attuned On
fields.description: The date you attuned to this object.

fields.name: Unattunable
fields.description: When true, this object can not be unattuned as an action.

fields.name: Active
fields.description: Flag to mark this as a current or active object.

fields.name: Weight
fields.description: The weight of this object

fields.name: Max Weight
fields.description: The maximum weight of this object

fields.name: Max Encumberance
fields.description: The maximum weight of this object

fields.name: Size
fields.description: The size of this object

fields.name: Stat
fields.description: The main stat for this object

fields.name: Max Attuned
fields.description: Maximum number of attunements

fields.name: encumberance
fields.description: The encumberance of this object, representing how difficult it is to carry

fields.name: Enchantment Rating
fields.description: The power of enchantments on this object

fields.name: Ranged Weapon
fields.description: Flag to indicate if this object is considered a ranged weapon

fields.name: Response
fields.description: Maps various 'event' names to arrays that describe responses that are then consumed in various parts

fields.name: Is Minion
fields.description: When true the entity is a minion

fields.name: Enchantments
fields.description: Enchantments on this object

fields.name: Versatile Weapon
fields.description: Flag to indicate if this object can be wielded with different hand combinations

fields.name: Versatillity
fields.description: Maps a number to new parent to assume for the usage of that many hands.

fields.name: Melee Weapon
fields.description: Flag to indicate if this object is considered a melee weapon

fields.name: Thrown Weapon
fields.description: Flag to indicate if this object is considered a throwable weapon

fields.name: Color Flag
fields.description: The color of the lego hat to distinguish this NPC from other similar NPCs

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The primary type for this object

fields.name: Types
fields.description: The types that apply to this object

fields.name: Inside
fields.description: The entity this entity currently resides, such as a building or ship.

fields.name: Location
fields.description: Where this object is currently considered to be located.

fields.name: Locations
fields.description: List of locations connected to this object.

fields.name: Associations
fields.description: Objects directly connected to this one. In the case of knowledge and similar classes, this indicates the objects that the knowledge conveys knowledge of

fields.name: Knowledge Matrix
fields.description: Maps object identities to arrays of properties explicitly known about that object. Forgotten objects map to null. Known with no explicit information map to empty arrays. This field is calculated during events that affect the object's knowledge.

fields.name: Knowns
fields.description: List of properties that are known through associated knowledges.

fields.name: Spells
fields.description: Spells contained inside of, prepared for, or granted by this object.

fields.name: Known Spells
fields.description: Spells that this entity knows for changing prepared spell list (`spells`).

fields.name: Skills
fields.description: Skills that this object can perform.

fields.name: Must Know
fields.description: When set, this object is hidden unless the viewing object has knowledge of this object or possess the specifically mention knowledge ID mentioned here.

fields.name: Widgets
fields.description: List of objects describing widgets

fields.name: Page
fields.description: A page that serves as a method for storing information.

fields.name: Pages
fields.description: List of pages associated with this object. Primarily used for rendering journals.

fields.name: Carried Weight
fields.description: The total weight of things being carried by this object. Computed by event handlers.

fields.name: Inventory
fields.description: List of item IDs that this object is carrying.

fields.name: Price
fields.description: The base price for this object.

fields.name: Expiration
fields.description: When this effect or item expires. This is a conveience field for display as the length of anything that expires should be described as a duration.

fields.name: Critical
fields.description: The minimum number needed to roll for an attack to be considered a critical strike.

fields.name: Critical
fields.description: The minimum number at which a skill check is considered to be a critical success.

fields.name: Failure
fields.description: The maximum number at which a skill check is considered to be a critical fail.

fields.name: Score
fields.description: An abstract point value for this object, used in estimating power or worth or value for comparison.

fields.name: Threat
fields.description: A general estimate of how threatening a creature is.

fields.name: Label
fields.description: Used as display text for this object in certain situations instead of the name, such as on a map.

fields.name: Links To
fields.description: Used for locations (or similar) to note door or portal like effects for mapping purposes.

fields.name: Note
fields.description: Game Master note.

fields.name: Share Inventory
fields.description: Flag to share your inventory with companions.

fields.name: Hidden Inventory
fields.description: List of items in your inventory to hide from sharing.

fields.name: Concentration
fields.description: A caster must maintain concentration on this spell and has a limited number of spells they can maintain this way.

fields.name: Max Concentrations
fields.description: The number of concentration spells a caster can maintain at once.

fields.name: Concentrations
fields.description: List of spells that a caster is concentrating on with the oldest listed first.

fields.name: Concealed
fields.description: Flag to prevent display of this object ot players

fields.name: Time Tracked
fields.description: Used on party object to track their game date/time and restore it when loaded. Two parties with this flagged can NOT be active at the same time and membership is checked when loading party. This is specifically to handle having multiple parties in the same world with differing in-game times but can also serve to keep party entities from being active together.

fields.name: Party's Time
fields.description: Tracks the time for the party. This time is set in the Universe when this party is loaded. Attempting to load a party member when the universe is not at this time should fail.

fields.name: Always Present
fields.description: When set, if an object shares a location with this object, it is considered visible. This is for things like shops to be visible.

fields.name: Opening Time
fields.description: Day offset in seconds at which in Game time when this object opens. Essentially for shops.

fields.name: Operation Time
fields.description: How long this entity stays open Essentially for shops.

fields.name: Root
fields.description: Used to flag an object as a starting point for any branching considerations

fields.name: Next
fields.description: Used to flag the next objects in a chain

fields.name: Items
fields.description: List of item IDs loosely associated with this object with no carrying or attachment considerations.

fields.name: Owned By
fields.description: Maps player IDs that own this object to the time at which they acquired it, 1 for general ownership, or 0 to disable ownership.

fields.name: Discount
fields.description: Maps entity IDs to a float for price to be paid (such as .8 for a 20% discount).

fields.name: Players
fields.description: Player IDs associated with this object. Typically for use with dashboards and other high level display objects.

fields.name: Absent
fields.description: Players who were absent for this.

fields.name: Attchments
fields.description: List of item IDs considered attached to this object.
